DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study compare - non invasive measurement arterial pressure ( CNAP monitor ) - invasive measurement arterial pressure ( radial artery catheter ) induction maintenance general anesthesia
DOC.criteria: Age > 18 ASA II , III IV weight 40 180 kg ; BMI < 35 surgical procedure perform supine position normal Allen 's test hand Doppler examination . cardiac arrhythmia , history vascular surgery vascular implant upper limb
